Translations.Text: DEUS testimentum admit those believe lead righteous VITA into gardens flowing streams They adorned therein bracelets gold pearls their garments therein est silk
They guided bonus words they guided path de the Multus Praised
Surely those disbelieve repulse others path DEUS ex Sanctus Masjid nos designated totus people - est they natives visitors! - seek pollute it corrupt it nos afflict them painful retribution
